text:
-6-
January 45 - Commercial TV program director wishes return to ETV. 2
years ETV producer-director; 2 1/2 years commercial TV program direct¬
or. Wrote, produced and directed national award-winning series.
Production experience includes film - silent and SOF - kinescope, and
live. Seeking responsible ETV position utilizing background. Male,
single, 33, M.S. Location open. $7500.
January 46 - \oung TV director would like permanent position as staff
TV director. Experience includes the birth pangs of 2 television opera¬
tions, art supervision, and day-by-day TV production and direction.
Male* single, 30, M.A. Location open. $4600.
January 47 - Man with some early ETV experience as writer-producer,
and some experience as. commercial film story editor, teacher, radio-TV
actor, is interested in a combination radio-TV-film production and
training position, or teaching in mass media. Licensed teacher. Male,
married, 39, PhD. Location open. $4800.
January 48 - Producer-director with 3 years commercial TV experience
is looking for opportunity to grow with ETV. Business experience;
accomplished musician, designer. Male, married, 34, M.A. Loca¬
tion open. $6000.
January 49 - Young man just out of college wishes to work in either
educational radio or TV as announcer, production assistant, etc. Single,
23, A.B. Willing to work anywhere at not less than $60/wk.
January 50 - Veteran commercial radio broadcaster desires to pass on
his knowledge to younger people preparing to enter the field. Currently
employed by 5000 watt station as news and program director. Back¬
ground includes management of small station. No actual work in TV
but not a stranger to it. Male, 3 6, B. Ed., married. Location open.
$5200.
January 51 - Woman, 49, single, B.A., with 10 years experience in
radio, 8 in commercial and 2 in educational - is looking for a perman¬
ent place with writing and production staff of radio-TV operation with
university or college. Experienced in writing, editing, daily broad¬
casts, public service shows, etc. Location open. $300/mth.
January 52 - Commercial TV operations manager and program director,
thoroughly experienced in all phases TV operation, is seeking respon¬
sible position with progressive ETV outlet. Male, 31, married, M.A.
Location open. $7500.
